org.mini2Dx.gettext

Class GetText

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.gettext.GetText

  • public class GetText
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for using gettext. Most developer should just need this class and calling add(PoFile) to add translations.

    By default, the Locale is set to Locale.ENGLISH. This can be changed via setLocale(Locale)

        public static java.lang.String tr(java.lang.String sourceText)
        Translates source based on currently set Locale
        Parameters:
        sourceText - The source text to translate (msgid)
        Returns:
        The source text if no translation can be found, else returns msgstr

      • tr

        public static java.lang.String tr(java.lang.String sourceText,
                                  java.lang.Object... values)
        Translates source based on currently set Locale and injects values into the text
        Parameters:
        sourceText - The source text to translate (msgid)
        values - The values to be injected using MessageFormat
        Returns:
        The source text if no translation can be found, else returns msgstr

      • trn

        public static java.lang.String trn(java.lang.String sourceText,
                                   java.lang.String sourcePluralText,
                                   int n)
        Translates the plural form of a source based on currently set Locale
        Parameters:
        sourceText - The source text to translate (msgid)
        sourcePluralText - The plural source text to translate (msgid_plural)
        n - The plural index (msgstr[n])
        Returns:
        The source text if no translation can be found, else returns msgstr[n]

      • trn

        n - The plural index (msgstr[n])

      • trnc

        public static java.lang.String trnc(java.lang.String context,
                                    java.lang.String sourceText,
                                    java.lang.String sourcePluralText,
                                    int n)
        Translates the plural form of a source based on currently set Locale based on a specified context
        Parameters:
        context - The translation context (msgctxt)
        sourceText - The source text to translate (msgid)
        sourcePluralText - The plural source text to translate (msgid_plural)
        n - The plural index (msgstr[n])
        Returns:
        The source text if no translation can be found, else returns msgstr[n]

      • trnc

        public static java.lang.String trnc(java.lang.String context,
                                    java.lang.String sourceText,
                                    java.lang.String sourcePluralText,
                                    int n,
                                    java.lang.Object... values)
        Translates the plural form of a source based on currently set Locale based on a specified context and injects values into the text
        Parameters:
        context - The translation context (msgctxt)
        sourceText - The source text to translate (msgid)
        sourcePluralText - The plural source text to translate (msgid_plural)
        n - The plural index (msgstr[n])
        values - The values to be injected using MessageFormat
        Returns:
        The source text if no translation can be found, else returns msgstr[n]

      • getTranslationEntry

        public static TranslationEntry getTranslationEntry(java.util.Locale locale,
                                                   java.lang.String context,
                                                   java.lang.String sourceText)
        Returns the underlying TranslationEntry for a specific msgid
        Parameters:
        locale - The Locale to look up
        context - Null if default context should be used, or, msgctxt
        sourceText - The source text to translate (msgid)
        Returns:
        Null if no such entry exists

      • add

        public static void add(PoFile poFile)
        Loads a PoFile for translation usage. Note: This does not need to match the current Locale
        Parameters:
        poFile - A PoFile instance

      • setLocale

        public static void setLocale(java.util.Locale locale)
        Sets the default Locale
        Parameters:
        locale - The Locale to use
